posts.name: Bryant's Breakfast
posts.note: Bustling, counter-serve eatery dishing out classic Southern breakfast and lunch fare.

posts.name: Dyer's Burgers *
posts.note: Popular diner known for using the same grease to deep-fry their burgers and fries for over a century.

posts.name: Charlie Vergos' Rendezvous
posts.note: BBQ spot with upstairs beer hall serving up racks of smoked ribs and sausages dusted with dry rub. Need to order the lamb riblets, which is hte sleeper dish.
